channel.title: 事件 (不完整) on Chine.eu
channel.description: Recent content in 事件 (不完整) on Chine.eu

item.title: 2022年02月05日龙潭公园的种族歧视
item.description: 2022年02月05日。 I need to ask a native Chinese speaker what “还是死全家了？！” means. Could it be interpreted as a death threat? I don’t know. I need to ask someone first. Various notes I wrote at the time regarding that incident: https://m.weibo.cn/7055094295/4733458263575619 https://m.weibo.cn/7055094295/4733494037055455 https://m.weibo.cn/7055094295/4733497677710110 https://m.weibo.cn/7055094295/4733509488607552 https://m.weibo.cn/7055094295/4733514203269626 Did a Chinese Official from 中国检察 (cc @

item.title: 2021年04月17日玉泉山城郊森林公园的种族歧视
item.description: 2021年04月17日玉泉山城郊森林公园的种族歧视。 Quickly: racial discrimination. This is the best example I have of racism in China since I went to the park with a friend of mine who is an American citizen but who was born in China. Security guards surounded me and wanted to send me to quarantine even though

item.title: 2021年03月28日 assault and battery, deprivation of freedom
item.description: 2021年03月28日 After politely and respectfully reminding a man that he couldn’t park on the sidewalk, I was victim of an assault and battery and deprivation of freedom. He publicly insulted me. The Longtan Police station, which I want to sue for dereliction of duty, condoning racism, filing false police reports, and deleting evidence, among other crimes, refused to file the case. They said there was

item.title: 2021年01月21日督军府旧址的种族歧视
item.description: 2021年01月21日督军府旧址的种族歧视。 Your browser does not support the video tag. The Gulou Police station had to come to set me free after I was illegally detained by the man not wearing a mask. I didn’t receive a notice of filing (立案通知书). I didn’t receive a notice of non-filling

item.title: 2021年01月09日 mentally disturbed woman
item.description: 2021年01月09日。 I politely and respectfully explained a woman that her car was badly parked. She would end up harassing me. I believe she could be charged with witness tampering, and picking quarrels and provoking trouble (寻衅滋事). The Procuratorate should check if some sort of reckless endangerment could apply in China. Your browser does not support the video tag.

item.title: 2020年02月26日龙潭公园的种族歧视
item.description: 2020年05月02日。 On May 02, 2020, I was victim of an assault and battery. According to me, it could qualify as an assault with a deadly weapon. The driver who almost hit me with his car would later stop his car and hit me on my face. He also made a comment which, if, and only if, I understood correctly, could be interpreted as a

item.title: 2020年04月30日迎泽公园的种族歧视
item.description: 2020年04月30日迎泽公园的种族歧视。 I didn’t receive a notice of filing (立案通知书). I didn’t receive a notice of non-filling (不予立案通知书). I didn’t receive a receipt of case (受案回执) (for administrative cases only).

item.title: 2020年02月26日龙潭公园的种族歧视
item.description: 2020年02月26日龙潭公园的种族歧视。 This incident is important since the Longtan Police acknowledge the security guard was wrong. We didn’t receive a notice of filing (立案通知书). We didn’t receive a notice of non-filling (不予立案通知书). We didn’t receive a receipt of case (

item.title: 2020年02月18日 false arrest by a CPC member
item.description: 2020年02月18日 I was illegally arrested and interrogated for having respectfully reminded a man, who was a member of the CPC, that his car was illegally parked.

item.title: 2019年12月13日 assault and battery near Walmart
item.description: On December 13, 2019, I was victim of an assault and battery near Walmart. The Police would later put pressure on me and my wife not to talk about this case on social media. I didn’t receive a notice of filing (立案通知书). I didn’t receive a notice of non-filling (不予立案通知书). I didn’t receive a receipt of case (受

item.title: 2019年12月07日 MY WIFE INSULTED BY A MAN
item.description: 2019年12月07日 that day, my wife was insulted by a man. It was racially motivated because I was a foreigner. He told her that she didn’t deserve to be Chinese.
